content: Yes, the Bengals' defense has the potential to be improved this season with the additions of Trey Hendrickson and Chidobe Awuzie. The team also has some young talent on defense, including defensive end Sam Hubbard and linebacker Logan Wilson. If these players can continue to develop and improve, the defense could help the Bengals take a step forward this season. However, it's important to note that the team is still relatively young and inexperienced in many areas, which could lead to some growing pains. Nevertheless, Bengals fans have reason to be optimistic and excited to see how the team performs this season.
